name: Process Reasoning Summaries
abstract: Produces high-level reasoning step summaries for each response without exposing raw chain-of-thought. Designed for governance audits that require narrative visibility without sensitive cognitive traces.

identity.description: Logical actor associated with the response

id.description: Opaque response identifier scoped to the session

summary.description: High-level answer shared with the user

steps.description: Ordered summaries of the reasoning process with sensitive details redacted

notes.description: Optional additional governance notes without raw chain-of-thought

redaction_policy.description: Summaries must exclude verbatim chain-of-thought. Capture only narrativized reasoning milestones, signal highlights, and governance notes.

notes.usage: Call process.logs.reasoning_summary at the end of a response to capture sanitized reasoning context.
notes.privacy: Do not include literals from intermediate scratchpads or hidden tool outputs; paraphrase into coarse steps.
notes.governance: TVA reviews the semantic structure only; no signature or logging hooks are attached.

notes: Moved process_logs wrapper under library/audits and embedded schema definition.
Retired the standalone tracehub manifest by embedding buffer, export, and monitoring guidance directly in process_logs.
Documented TVA + Sentinel review as a reasoning checkpoint rather than signature handling.
Simplified process_logs to a single reasoning_summary function with a redacted reasoning schema.
Removed buffer/export directives so the module only emits sanitized reasoning steps per response.
